import AdminSidebar from "../../adminSideBar/AdminSidebar" import { useGetSingleProductQuery } from "../../../../features/productApi" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState,useEffect } from "react" const EditProduct = () => { const { productId } = useParams() const { data, error, isLoading } = useGetSingleProductQuery(productId) let initialState = { name:'', image:'', price:0, } console.log('data',data) const [editItem,setEditItem] = useState(initialState) useEffect(()=>{ if(data){ setEditItem({...data.data}) } },[data]) console.log('state',editItem) return (
{data &&
Edit Product
}
) } export default EditProduct
